alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 4:57AM MDT until April 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Limon. * WHEN...High winds will develop this morning and continue through early evening. Similar winds are expected again on Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and a few power outages may result. Strong winds will likely lead to rapid fire growth of any new fire.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
